# Configuration for module: CMakeListGenerator

set( SOURCE_FILES 
  src/main.cpp
)

# Make sure the PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES variable is always defined
 set( PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES "" )

# Make sure the PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES variable is always defined
 set( PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES "" )

# For ease of use make a variable that has all files for this module
set( ALL_FILES ${HEADER_FILES} ${SOURCE_FILES} ${PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES} ${PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES} )




#******** END OF AUTOGENERATED CONTENT ********



if (WIN32)
  add_executable( CMakeListGenerator WIN32 ${HEADER_FILES} ${SOURCE_FILES} )
else()
  add_executable( CMakeListGenerator ${HEADER_FILES} ${SOURCE_FILES} )
endif()
add_dependencies( CMakeListGenerator gucefCORE gucefMT)
target_link_libraries( CMakeListGenerator gucefCORE gucefMT )
set_target_properties( CMakeListGenerator PROPERTIES COMPILE_DEFINITIONS CMAKELISTGENERATOR_BUILD_MODULE )
GUCEF_config_tool( CMakeListGenerator )

  include_directories( ../../gucefCORE/include/android )
endif( ANDROID )

if ( LINUX )
  include_directories( ../../gucefCORE/include/linux )
endif( LINUX )

if ( WIN32 )
  include_directories( ../../gucefCORE/include/mswin )
endif( WIN32 )

if ( WIN64 )
  include_directories( ../../gucefCORE/include/mswin )
endif( WIN64 )
